description: This file defines a ViewBinding class 'ItemNoteBinding' as a surrogate for the XML layout 'item_note.xml'. It provides a static inflate method to create and initialize the view components of a note item, including references to UI elements like a card, title, content, and delete button.

classes.name: ItemNoteBinding
classes.description: A minimal ViewBinding surrogate class that provides access to UI components of the note item layout.

methods.name: inflate
methods.description: A static method to inflate the 'item_note' layout and initialize the binding with references to its views.
